no.uit.ods.beaconme

Class BeaconClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uit.ods.beaconme.BeaconClient

  • public class BeaconClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The BeaconClient is an API which handles all communication between a HTTP server and any user of this class. All POST requests are verified at the server by session tokens. Session tokens are automatically handled by this very class.

    The serverUrl attribute for the BeaconClient class is set accordingly to the server url. Be aware, the url is hardcoded!

    Latest Changes - Attribute 'topic' is added to each beacon as in result of get request. - Method getCategory(categoryId, topic) is introduced. Now supports search on categories from id and/or topic attribute.

    Since:
    2015-02-26
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Vegard Strand (vst030@post.uit.no)

      • getBeacons

        public JSONArray getBeacons(java.lang.String mac,
                            java.lang.String uuid,
                            int categoryId,
                            java.lang.String beaconUrl,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String major,
                            java.lang.String minor)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns a JSONArray with a collection of JSONObjects representing beacons. If no beacons were found on search parameters, the method returns an empty array. If no connection or error, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        mac - String
        uuid - String
        categoryId - Integer
        beaconUrl - String
        name - String
        major - String
        minor - String
        Returns:
        JSONArray with JSONObjects representing beacons
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
